text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem cs-sign-grade-of-recommendation

This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-sign-grade-of-recommendation defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionDeutsch (German, de)
A Grade AAt least one meta-analysis, systematic review, or RCT rated as 1++, and directly applicable to the target population; or a body of evidence consisting principally of studies rated as 1+, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results.Empfehlungsgrad A
B Grade BA body of evidence including studies rated as 2++, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 1++ or 1+.Empfehlungsgrad B
C Grade CA body of evidence including studies rated as 2+, directly applicable to the target population and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2++.Empfehlungsgrad C
D Grade DEvidence level 3 or 4; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2+; or consensus-based recommendation.Empfehlungsgrad D

name: SIGNGradeOfRecommendation
title: SIGN Grade of Recommendation
description: CodeSystem representing the Scottish Intercollegiate Guidelines Network (SIGN) Grades of Recommendation.

concept.definition: At least one meta-analysis, systematic review, or RCT rated as 1++, and directly applicable to the target population; or a body of evidence consisting principally of studies rated as 1+, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results.

extension.valueString: Mindestens eine Metaanalyse, systematische Review oder RCT mit 1++ bewertet und direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar; oder ein Evidenzkörper bestehend hauptsächlich aus Studien mit 1+ bewertet, direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar und mit konsistenten Ergebnissen.

concept.definition: A body of evidence including studies rated as 2++, directly applicable to the target population, and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 1++ or 1+.

extension.valueString: Evidenzkörper mit Studien bewertet als 2++, direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar und mit konsistenten Ergebnissen; oder extrapolierte Evidenz aus Studien bewertet als 1++ oder 1+.

concept.definition: A body of evidence including studies rated as 2+, directly applicable to the target population and demonstrating overall consistency of results; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2++.

extension.valueString: Evidenzkörper mit Studien bewertet als 2+, direkt auf die Zielpopulation anwendbar und mit konsistenten Ergebnissen; oder extrapolierte Evidenz aus Studien bewertet als 2++.

concept.definition: Evidence level 3 or 4; or extrapolated evidence from studies rated as 2+; or consensus-based recommendation.

extension.valueString: Evidenzlevel 3 oder 4; oder extrapolierte Evidenz aus Studien bewertet als 2+; oder konsensbasierte Empfehlung.
